verses.name: Numbers 30:1
verses.text: And Moses spake unto the heads of the tribes concerning the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the Lord hath commanded.

verses.name: Numbers 30:2
verses.text: If a man vow a vow unto the Lord, or swear an oath to bind his soul with a bond; he shall not break his word, he shall do according to all that proceedeth out of his mouth.

verses.name: Numbers 30:3
verses.text: If a woman also vow a vow unto the Lord, and bind herself by a bond, being in her father’s house in her youth;
